name: OTIntrusion
description: Case template for managing intrusions in OT/ICS environments.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of an intrusion targeting OT infrastructure.

tasks.title: Identify affected OT systems
tasks.description: Review compromised industrial devices (PLC, SCADA, HMI) and their footprint across the OT network.

tasks.title: Isolate industrial networks
tasks.description: Apply segmentation or controlled disconnection to prevent lateral movement.

tasks.title: Collect evidence
tasks.description: Extract controller logs, network captures, and configurations while maintaining chain of custody.

tasks.title: Analyze compromise vectors
tasks.description: Determine how the attacker accessed the OT network (VPN, social engineering, vulnerabilities).

tasks.title: Coordinate with OT teams
tasks.description: Work with OT engineers to assess impact on industrial processes and apply mitigations.

tasks.title: Restore and harden
tasks.description: Restore operations and implement OT-specific security controls.

tasks.title: Maintain chain of custody
tasks.description: Document how critical evidence in industrial environments is handled.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Update OT cybersecurity procedures and feed lessons into the defense strategy.
